Hi,

I'm using KSP 1.9.1.2788 with Breaking Ground installed.  When helicopter rotors are connected by 8-way symmetry to an electric rotor one or two sizes down (e.g. a heli blade type B to an EM-16S rotor), when the craft loads on the runway or launchpad, the helicopter rotors flail around uncontrollably.  I am able to reproduce the bug in a fresh install of KSP 1.9.1.2788 with only Breaking Ground 1.4.1 installed.

Picture of test craft here .

Is anyone else having this problem?

Thanks for your time.
